name: Bird go Flap Flap!
description:
Hey look, another Flappy Bird clone!

...but this time, it's hand drawn!

This is just like any Flappy Bird clone, you make a bird jump over a set of pipes as obstacles. You hit them, you lose!

It also has a night mode if you play long enough!

That's it. Thank you for playing.

Instructions:
  • Up arrow, Space, Tap to jump.
  • When you lose, press the jump key to restart.
